title: Living tomorrow. No. 092
brief_description: Cinemagazine items: Caravans for hospitals for up to 60 people to be used in disaster areas in third world countries; photo developing for color printing for amateur photographers; North Sea Oil and Gas - rigs and dangers and rescue operations; transmissions of sound and the brain at Cardiff University.
